column7: Moves Character to any Same Nat PC
Moves Character to any land hex.
Shows all nations of that allegiance.
Shows that nations relations to you.
Shows which nation’s character it is.
Shows location of army (1 hex radius)

Shows all Nat forces w/in 6 hexes.
Shows PC info (Like Scout PC order)
